entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain with risk of thundershowers. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of freezing rain this evening then to periods of snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
